    {
      "properties": {
        "title": "Creation of local volume LocalOnlyVolume1 failed",
        "scope": 1,
        "alertType": "Job failure",
        "appearedAtTime": "2017-06-14T12:44:08.3408967Z",
        "appearedAtSourceTime": "2017-06-14T12:44:08.3408967Z",
        "clearedAtTime": "2017-06-19T09:50:02.9901743Z",
        "clearedAtSourceTime": "2017-06-19T09:50:02.9901743Z",
        "source": {
          "name": "Device05ForSDKTest",
          "timeZone": "Pacific Standard Time",
          "alertSourceType": 1
        },
        "recommendation": "Connectivity issues could be preventing the space creation operation from successfully completing. Local volumes are thickly provisioned and the process of creating space involves spilling tiered volumes to the cloud. If there are no connectivity issues, you may have exhausted the local space on the device. Please review if space exists on the device before retrying this operation.",
        "resolutionReason": "",
        "severity": 2,
        "status": 1,
        "errorDetails": {
          "errorCode": "0x000000BC",
          "errorMessage": "An unknown error has occurred. Error code: (188).",
          "occurences": 1
        },
        "detailedInformation": {}
      },

    },
    {
      "properties": {
        "title": "Local snapshots for NewVolumeGroupLocal2 have been invalidated",
        "scope": 1,
        "alertType": "SnapShot Capacity",
        "appearedAtTime": "2017-06-14T11:40:30.5303779Z",
        "appearedAtSourceTime": "2017-06-14T11:40:30.5303779Z",
        "clearedAtTime": "2017-06-19T10:28:53.7177773Z",
        "clearedAtSourceTime": "2017-06-19T10:28:53.7177773Z",
        "source": {
          "name": "Device05ForSDKTest",
          "timeZone": "Pacific Standard Time",
          "alertSourceType": 1
        },
        "recommendation": "To ensure that this does not recur in the future, please review the local snapshot schedules for this backup policy and delete any local snapshots that are no longer needed. Frequent local snapshots alongside a high data churn in the volumes associated with this backup policy group might cause local space on the device to be consumed quickly.",
        "resolutionReason": "",
        "severity": 0,
        "status": 1,
        "errorDetails": {
          "errorCode": "",
          "errorMessage": "",
          "occurences": 1
        },
        "detailedInformation": {
          "error message": "The local snapshots for NewVolumeGroupLocal2 have been invalidated and deleted because they exceeded the local space on the device."
        }
      },
